english.segment1: Praise is rising, eyes are turning to You. We turn to You. Hope is stirring, hearts are yearning for You. We long for You. 혩Cause when we see You, we find strength to face the day. In Your presence, all our fears are washed away. Washed away
english.segment2: Hosanna Hosanna. You are the God who saves us, Worthy of all our praises. Hosanna Hosanna. Come have Your way among us. We welcome You here Lord Jesus
english.segment3: Hear the sound of hearts returning to You. We turn to You. In Your kingdom broken lives are renewed. You make us new. 혩Cause when we see You, we find strength to face the day. In Your presence, all our fears are washed away. Washed away
english.segment4: Hosanna Hosanna. You are the God who saves us, Worthy of all our praises. Hosanna Hosanna. Come have Your way among us. We welcome You here Lord Jesus
english.segment5: 혩Cause when we see You, we find strength to face the day. In Your presence all our fears are washed away. 혩Cause when we see You we find strength to face the day. In Your presence, all our fears are washed away. Washed away
english.segment6: . Hosanna Hosanna. You are the God who saves us, Worthy of all our praises. Hosanna Hosanna. Come have Your way among us. We welcome You here Lord Jesus
